name: marksense
description: A beautiful Notion-like Markdown editor for VS Code, powered by Tiptap — with AI assistance, slash commands, and rich formatting

walkthroughs.title: Getting Started with Marksense
walkthroughs.description: Learn how to edit Markdown files in a rich, Notion-like editor.

steps.title: Open a Markdown File
steps.description: Open any ``.md`` file in your workspace to get started.

media.markdown: Open a ``.md`` file from the Explorer sidebar or via **File → Open File**.

steps.title: Enable Marksense Editor
steps.description:
Right-click the editor tab and choose **Reopen Editor With… → Marksense Editor**.

[Open a Markdown file](command:workbench.action.quickOpen?%5B%22*.md%22%5D)

media.markdown: Right-click the editor tab → **Reopen Editor With…** → **Marksense Editor**.

steps.title: Make Marksense the Default Editor
steps.description:
To always open ``.md`` files with Marksense, add this to your settings:
```json
"workbench.editorAssociations": {
  "*.md": "marksense.editor"
}
```

[Open Settings (JSON)](command:workbench.action.openSettingsJson)

media.markdown: Right-click the tab → **Reopen Editor With…** → **Marksense Editor** → click **Configure default editor for '*.md'…** at the bottom of the picker.

steps.title: Enable AI Features (Optional)
steps.description:
For autocorrect, grammar correction, and sentence completion, add a [Typewise](https://www.typewise.app) API token.

Contact [apikey@typewise.app](mailto:apikey@typewise.app) to get a key, then paste it in settings.

[Open Marksense Settings](command:workbench.action.openSettings?%5B%22marksense%22%5D)

media.markdown: Without a token the extension works as a pure offline editor — no data leaves your machine.

marksense.typewiseToken.description: Typewise API token for autocorrect, grammar correction, and sentence completion. Contact apikey@typewise.app to get a key.
marksense.typewiseToken.markdownDescription: API token for [Typewise](https://www.typewise.app) autocorrect, grammar correction, and sentence completion. Without a token these features are disabled and the extension works as a pure offline editor. To get an API key, contact [apikey@typewise.app](mailto:apikey@typewise.app).

marksense.autoSaveDelay.description: Debounce delay in milliseconds before syncing edits to the file
marksense.autoSaveDelay.markdownDescription: Debounce delay in **milliseconds** before syncing edits to the file. Every edit auto-saves after this delay. Range: `100`–`5000` ms.
